revised_title: Molecular Structure of Strychnine and Brucine
tldr: The author investigates the molecular structure of the alkaloids strychnine and brucine, discovering that they are both quinoline derivatives. Strychnine is a di-aoid, di-tertiary base, while brucine is dimethoxystrychnine. The author also discusses the chemical reactions and transformations of these alkaloids, including their synthesis, oxidation, and isomerization.
